com.google.api.ads.dfp.lib.utils

Class XmlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.dfp.lib.utils.XmlUtils

  • public final class XmlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for processing and handling SOAP XML.
    Author:
    api.arogal@gmail.com (Adam Rogal)

    • Method Detail

      • prettyPrint

        public static java.lang.String prettyPrint(java.lang.String xml)
                                    throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                           org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Pretty print the XML string given to this method.
        Parameters:
        xml - A UTF-8 encoded XML String to be pretty printed
        Returns:
        the original XML if it's a malformed document, pretty printed XML otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O exception occurs
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if the document has SAX decoding problems
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if construction problems occur
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if xml == null

      • getXmlDocument

                                           throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                  org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                  java.io.IOException
        Gets the XML document given its string encoding.
        Parameters:
        xml - the string encoding of the XML
        Returns:
        an XML document
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O exception occurs
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if the document has SAX decoding problems
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - if construction problems occur
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if xml == null

      • getSanitizedSoapXml

        public static java.lang.String getSanitizedSoapXml(java.lang.String xml,
                                   org.w3c.dom.Node headerNode)
        Gets a sanitized soap XML request stripped of sensitive headers defined in SENSITIVE_HEADER_TAGS.
        Parameters:
        xml - the XML to sanitize
        headerNode - the Node header from xml
        Returns:
        a String representation of the XML with sensitive values removed

      • extractResponseHeaderNode

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node extractResponseHeaderNode(org.w3c.dom.Node soapHeader)
        Extracts the actual header node. This should be updated with each API update that changes the header object, such as "ResponseHeader".
        Parameters:
        soapHeader - the soap header
        Returns:
        the Node that contains elements such as "responseTime"

      • extractRequestHeaderNode

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node extractRequestHeaderNode(org.w3c.dom.Node soapHeader)
        Extracts the actual header node. This should be updated with each API update that changes the header object, such as "RequestHeader".
        Parameters:
        soapHeader - the soap header
        Returns:
        the Node that contains elements such as "email" and "clientEmail"

        Returns:
